item.title: Major winter storm impacts post-Thanksgiving travel for millions
item.description: Winter storm warnings and advisories extended from Montana to Ohio, the National Weather Service said. Forecasters warned there could be airport delay...

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Nov. 30)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: U.S. airlines report short-term disruptions amid Airbus software issue
item.description: Airbus recommended an emergency software update to the A320 family of aircraft.

item.title: Investigators probe suspect's background in D.C. National Guard shooting
item.description: A National Guard member died in the wake of the shooting near the White House, President Trump said.

item.title: Venezuela says U.S. unilaterally suspended migrant repatriation flights
item.description: President Trump posted on social media that Venezuela's airspace should be considered as "closed in its entirety."
